column4: can somebody please point out where I can get information on how to use evolution?
disk utility is already installed in liveCD why would you use gparted?
thanks a_p3rson I was looking for use only gnome native applications that is why I wanted to use evolution
- Do you absolutely need GNOME native? Because thunderbird (and firefox) have addons that can make it get very close to full integration with GNOME
